snippet: New York City Ballet’s season, which began on Tuesday, brought 12 ballets into repertory by Saturday night, going back to 1934 and up to 2006.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reflects upon the abundance of ballets, both old and new, that are being offered during New York City Ballet's spring season.
lead_paragraph: New York City Ballet’s season, which began on Tuesday, brought 12 ballets into repertory by Saturday night, going back to 1934 and up to 2006.

headline.seo: New York City Ballet Displays Its Riches
headline.main: One Week’s Journey Through a Whole Century in Ballet
headline.print_headline: One Week’s Journey Through a Whole Century in Ballet
